payload.description: Create UploadQueue.jsx component showing visual upload progress. Collapsible/expandable on mobile, horizontal thumbnail strip with status badges. Shows per-item progress bars, retry/cancel buttons (44px min). Props: queue (array of UploadItem), onRetry, onCancel, position ('top'|'bottom'|'inline'). Offline banner when not connected.
payload.context: Status badges: gray spinner for uploading, green checkmark for complete, red exclamation for failed. Uses optio-purple/optio-pink colors. Thumbnail size ~64px. Gap between items 8px minimum. Retry button per failed item. Shows 'Offline - will resume' when navigator.onLine is false.
